ai-patthana18.2:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.2:1.1_0: roots of the teaching are not rooted in conditions for the sake of a cause,
ai-patthana18.2:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.2:2.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana18.2:2.1_3: Seeing that with cause and reason,
ai-patthana18.2:4.1_0: or cause or reason it doesn’t give rise to reason for the sake of health.
ai-patthana18.2:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
